Snippet: @CrorkinDavis Hi Graeme, if you move into a property with no meter, you will need to pay Rateable Value charges until a meter is fitted. Usually the meter can be fitted on the survey visit. So it's likely you'll be on metered charges when the survey has been completed. Thanks - Rob
